definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Visit the Bottom-up application development from tables feature.
sentences.chinese: 以表爲基礎進行自下而上的應用程序開發。

sentences.english: The transformation to a bottom-up culture needs help from the top.
sentences.chinese: 轉變到一個自下而上的文化需要來自上層的幫助。

sentences.english: Cumulate orthopyroxene occurs almost from top to bottom of the section.
sentences.chinese: 堆積的斜方輝石几乎自下而上地分佈在整個剖面中。

sentences.english: His bottom-up approach tapped a wellspring of money and votes.
sentences.chinese: 他自下而上的辦法帶來了源源不斷的金錢和投票。

sentences.english: Therefore, the development style is typically bottom-up.
sentences.chinese: 因此，開發風格通常是自下而上的。

sentences.english: Life is a bottom-up, self-organized emergent property of organic molecules.
sentences.chinese: 生命是有機分子的凸顯特性自下而上自發形成的。

sentences.english: He also identified an alternative model which he called the bottom-up approach .
sentences.chinese: 他還發現了一個他稱爲自下而上的方式的模型。

sentences.english: That’s how we’ve always grown the American economy — from the bottom-up.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼我們始終自下而上地發展經濟。

sentences.english: These two areas can be difficult to reconcile with pure bottom-up solution design.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個方面難以與純自下而上解決方案設計相吻合。

sentences.english: It follows bottom-to-top approach as specified in the above diagram.
sentences.chinese: 它遵循的是上圖所示的自下而上的方式。

definition: upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
